headline: Right-wing
author: Mark Fiore
sentences: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis is waging a campaign against the Walt Disney Company because he didnt like the fact that Floridas largest private-sector employer opposed his Dont Say Gay? bill.
Like many other states, Florida Republicans are currently obsessed with what were teaching our school kids  particularly when it comes to naughty things like sex education and gender roles.

Sure, there are a few other things going on in the United States and the rest of the world, but for some reason, Republicans are still focused on imaginary cartoon characters.
I sure hope Floridas tin pot governor does all his autocratic overreaching and crashes and burns in Florida .
DeSantis retaliated against Disney by yanking a special tax arrangement Disney World had with the state.
